title: Help for Lost Account
body: I lost an account by the name of IGTGPEE. I lost the Email and don't remember the password, but I do remember the username to log in. If I can just get my hands on the email I should be able to log into it and recover the account. Thanks. Hope to hear from you soon.

replies.body: If you ever lose access to your account, your best bet is to hit us up through our [**Account Recovery Form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). We'll be able to go over all your account details and get you back on the Rift from there!
